item.title: Gadgets Weekly: Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition and more - Deccan Herald
item.description:
```html

Gadgets Weekly: Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition and more

Published: 15 December 2024, 00:30 IST

Technology companies have launched a range of personal technology products including smartphones, security cameras, and accessories during the week of December 9-15, 2024.

  • Samsung introduced Galaxy S24 and S24 Ultra Enterprise Edition with enhanced security features and a 12-month subscription to the Knox Suite.
  • Epson released the CW-C8050 label printer, which minimizes printing costs and boosts productivity with a high-yield ink pack system.
  • Panasonic unveiled the AI-powered surveillance camera with advanced object detection and enhanced performance capabilities.
  • Portronics launched the Vayu 5.0 tyre inflator, which comes with a rechargeable battery and user-friendly controls.
  • Blaupunkt introduced the BTW300 Moksha+ TWS earphones, featuring Active Noise Cancellation and 50 hours of playtime.
  • Asus plans to launch new AI-integrated laptops at CES 2025, aimed at enhancing user experience and productivity.
  • Reliance and BPL launched a new line of Home Theatre LED TVs equipped with advanced audio features.
  • Dayananda Sagar University joined OPPO India’s initiative to raise awareness about e-waste management.
  • NCERT partnered with YouTube to provide reliable educational content for students across grades 1-12.
  • Nothing has launched a Snake game widget on its smartphones, adding a nostalgic feature for users.
“Generation Green embodies our commitment to the Government of India's Net-Zero vision.” - Rakesh Bhardwaj, Head of Public Affairs at OPPO India.

This week saw a significant display of innovation in personal technology that emphasizes security, sustainability, and enhanced user experience, promising exciting developments for consumers and businesses alike.

```

item.title: NYT ‘Strands’ Hints, Spangram And Answers For Sunday, December 15 - Forbes
item.description:
NYT ‘Strands’ Hints, Spangram And Answers For Sunday, December 15

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 Source: Forbes

Looking for Saturday’s Strands hints, spangram and answers? You can find them here:

  • Sunday’s Strands involves astronomical themes, making it easier for science enthusiasts.
  • The game is a word search requiring players to find themed words and a special spangram.
  • The spangram links two sides of a letter grid and can be a proper name.
  • Hints for the game include "Moonlighting" and a crafted hint "____ New Year."
  • The answers for today include terms like WAXING, WANING, CRESCENT, FULL, QUARTER, and GIBBOUS.
“I learned that it’s pretty much when three quarters of the moon is showing with the rest of it in shadow.”

The NYT Strands puzzle continues to engage players with its unique combination of word search mechanics and thematic challenges, making it a favorite among puzzle enthusiasts.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Sunday, December 15 - Forbes
item.description:
‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Sunday, December 15

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: Forbes

Looking for Saturday’s Quordle hints and answers? You can find them here:

Hey, folks! Hints and the answers for today’s Quordle words are just ahead.

How To Play Quordle

Just start typing in words. You have four five-letter words to guess and nine attempts to find them all. The catch is that you play all four words simultaneously.

If you get a letter in the right place for any of the four words, it will light up in green. If a word contains a letter from one of your guesses but it’s in the wrong place, it will appear in yellow.

What Are Today’s Quordle Hints?

  • Word 1 (top left) hint — operated a car
  • Word 2 (top right) hint — one of a pair of poles that allow you to walk while you’re elevated from the ground
  • Word 3 (bottom left) hint — a type of fabric often used for bed sheets
  • Word 4 (bottom right) hint — a pro baseball player in San Francisco
  • Two of the words each have a pair of repeated letters
  • Today’s words start with D, S, L and G

What Are Today’s Quordle Answers?

Spoiler alert! Today’s words are...

  • DROVE
  • STILT
  • LINEN
  • GIANT

Be sure to check my blog for hints and the solution for Monday’s game if you need them.

Follow me on Twitter or LinkedIn.

item.title: Chinese flagship phones are great value for money, but they won't stay cheaper for much longer – here's why - TechRadar
item.description:
Chinese flagship phones are great value for money, but they won't stay cheaper for much longer – here's why

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: TechRadar

The article discusses the changing landscape of Chinese flagship smartphones, emphasizing their increasing prices while maintaining high value and specifications, particularly in Western markets.

  • Chinese brands like Xiaomi and Oppo are making significant inroads in Western markets, including the UK and Australia.
  • The Xiaomi 14 Ultra retails for £1,299, surpassing some of the most expensive models from established brands.
  • Chinese manufacturers, previously focused on cheaper alternatives, are shifting toward offering high-end devices at competitive prices.
  • Upcoming models are expected to carry even higher price tags, indicating a trend toward premium pricing.

The modus operandi for Chinese flagship challengers has changed: where previously these companies sought to offer comparable performance at cheaper prices, now they're focused on delivering better performance at bigger prices.

The article concludes that consumers might want to secure a Chinese flagship phone soon, as the era of affordable high-end devices may soon be over.

item.title: Apple faces backlash over false AI news alert: 'Luigi Mangione shoots himself' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Apple faces backlash over false AI news alert: 'Luigi Mangione shoots himself'

Date: December 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Apple is facing criticism after its AI service erroneously sent a fake news alert about Luigi Mangione, wrongly attributed to the BBC. The broadcasting service has filed a complaint regarding the incident.

  • The BBC claimed that Apple's AI-generated alert claiming Mangione had shot himself was false.
  • Luigi Mangione is currently in custody in Pennsylvania, awaiting extradition, and did not harm himself.
  • The alert misrepresented a story involving Mangione, who is accused of a murder linked to the United Healthcare CEO.
  • The BBC emphasized the importance of trust in their reporting and has raised concerns with Apple.
  • This incident follows previous misrepresentations by Apple’s AI service, including a false alert about Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu.
“BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world,” a BBC spokesperson stated, stressing the need for trust in information published in their name.

This incident highlights the challenges and responsibilities faced by tech companies in managing AI-generated news and its implications for factual accuracy.

item.title: Google NotebookLM now lets you chat with AI podcast hosts, gets a new UI and subscription plan - The Indian Express
item.description:
Google NotebookLM now lets you chat with AI podcast hosts: Here’s how to use it

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Google has introduced a new feature in its AI-powered notebook web app, NotebookLM, allowing users to engage in real-time conversations with AI podcast hosts.

  • Users can create AI-generated virtual podcasts using the Audio Overview feature.
  • The new Interactive mode lets users join the conversation with AI hosts and ask questions.
  • This feature is still experimental and is available with new Audio Overviews only.
  • NotebookLM is updated with Gemini 2.0 and a new unified interface with three panels: Sources, Chat, and Studio.
  • A subscription plan, NotebookLM Plus, offers enhanced features such as increased Audio Overviews and customizable notebooks.
“AI hosts may pause awkwardly before responding and may occasionally introduce inaccuracies.”

The latest features in NotebookLM aim to enhance user interaction and streamline the note-taking experience, making it a more engaging and productive tool for users.

item.title: New video games on PC, Xbox X/S, Netflix: Features, review, how to play - The Economic Times
item.description:
New video games on PC, Xbox X/S, Netflix: Features, review, how to play

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: The Feed

This weekend, PC, Xbox X/S, and Netflix users can enjoy two exciting new video games: "Indiana Jones and the Great Circle" and "Monument Valley 3".

  • "Indiana Jones and the Great Circle": Features the iconic character on a quest to recover a stolen cat mummy.
  • The game includes explorations from the Vatican to the pyramids in Egypt and features puzzle-solving and action sequences.
  • Developed by MachineGames, known for the Wolfenstein series, the game is available on Xbox X/S and PC.
  • "Monument Valley 3": This new installment evolves the series with a fresh protagonist and a maritime world filled with architectural puzzles.
  • Available to play on mobile through Netflix, the game maintains the same gravity-defying gameplay fans love.
"Raiders of the Lost Ark" has inspired dozens of video games, but it’s been a while since Indiana Jones himself has taken center stage.

Both games are set to attract fans and newcomers alike, ensuring an exciting gaming experience this weekend.

item.title: WhatsApp to Soon Launch Built-In Call Dialer for iPhone Users - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
WhatsApp to Soon Launch Built-In Call Dialer for iPhone Users

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: [Insert Source Here]

Tech giant Meta has announced that it will make a call dialer inbuilt into WhatsApp, specifically for iOS users. This feature will allow users to call directly from the app without the need to save phone numbers to their contacts.

  • The new call dialer will closely resemble the iPhone’s default dialer for regular calls.
  • Users can dial a number directly by clicking the (+) button in the calls icon.
  • This feature facilitates quick calls without saving every number.
  • WhatsApp is also updating to improve the quality of video and audio calls.
  • The call dialer feature is currently available for users with the latest beta version through TestFlight.
“The feature makes it easy for users to make quick calls without saving the number every time.”

The upcoming built-in call dialer is expected to enhance user convenience, further integrating communication capabilities within the WhatsApp app for iPhone users.

item.title: Download iOS 18.2 Now for ChatGPT in Siri, New AI Features and More - CNET
item.description:
Download iOS 18.2 Now for ChatGPT in Siri, New AI Features and More

Publication Date: December 11, 2024 | Source: CNET

The latest iOS 18.2 update has been released, bringing innovative AI features including ChatGPT integration with Siri, Genmoji for custom emojis, and more enhancements for iPhone users.

  • iOS 18.2 introduces Apple Intelligence features for compatible iPhones, including ChatGPT in Siri.
  • New features like Genmoji allow users to create custom emojis based on descriptions.
  • Visual Intelligence lets users identify objects using the camera.
  • Mail app now sorts emails into categories for better organization.
  • Find My app has been updated with options to share item locations.
  • iOS 18.2 includes other small improvements, like volume control on the lock screen and customizable default apps.
"With Apple Intelligence, instead of seeing a logo pop up on your screen when you activate Siri, you'll see a glowing light around your screen." - Apple Announcement

The update is available by navigating to Settings > General > Software Update. Users are encouraged to explore the new features and enhancements that enhance functionality and personalization on their devices.

item.title: From iPhone 16, Google Pixel 9 to Samsung S24: how have top smartphones evolved in 2024? - The Hindu
item.description:
From iPhone 16, Google Pixel 9 to Samsung S24: how have top smartphones evolved in 2024?

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: The Hindu

2024 has been an exciting year for flagship smartphones, featuring notable launches from various brands, including Google, Apple, and Samsung, showcasing advancements in technology and design.

  • The year saw major launches like the OnePlus 12, Vivo X100 Pro, Galaxy S24 Ultra, and the Pixel series 9.
  • Generative AI became a common feature in many new devices.
  • Vivo X100 Pro was notable for its camera capabilities and MediaTek Dimensity 9300 processor.
  • OnePlus 12 introduced Hasselblad-tuned cameras and was the first in India to use Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.
  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra showcased advanced AI features and a 200 MP main camera.
  • Xiaomi 14 debuted with Leica-tuned lenses and the new HyperOS.
  • Realme GT 6 offered excellent value with high specs at a lower price point.
  • Google Pixel 9 Pro XL emphasized design overhaul and AI functionalities.
  • Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max continued its dominance with cutting-edge features and high performance.
"Apple being Apple, cautiously divided its fan base into two sets: A18 and A18 Pro." - The Hindu

As smartphone technology rapidly evolves, 2024 has set new standards with innovations that cater to users' diverse needs, emphasizing both performance and user experience.

item.title: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Projects, a handy tool that makes it easier to organise things - The Indian Express
item.description:
OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Projects, a handy tool that makes it easier to organise things

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

OpenAI has announced the rollout of “Projects” for ChatGPT, a new feature designed to help users better organize their work, as part of its ongoing ‘shipmas’ celebrations.

  • Projects will be accessible from the left sidebar of ChatGPT.
  • Users can customize project titles and icons, add files, and provide instructions for the AI.
  • The feature allows users to import previous chats into ongoing projects.
  • Creating a project involves clicking the + button and naming the project.
  • Projects will utilize GPT-40 as the default model.
  • The feature is currently available for Plus, Pro, and Teams users, and will expand to Enterprise and Education users in early 2025.
  • Free users will receive access “as soon as possible.”
"OpenAI employees shared examples of using ChatGPT’s new Projects feature to plan a Secret Santa gift exchange and keep track of home maintenance."

In conclusion, the introduction of ChatGPT Projects aims to enhance user experience by simplifying the organization of tasks and integrating chat history into project management.

item.title: BBC says it has complained to Apple over AI-generated fake news attributed to broadcaster - The Guardian
item.description:
BBC says it has complained to Apple over AI-generated fake news attributed to broadcaster

Publication Date: Not specified Source: The Guardian

The BBC has filed a complaint with Apple regarding AI-generated fake news that was disseminated on iPhones and falsely attributed to the broadcaster.

  • The BBC objected to misleading information generated by Apple's new feature, Apple Intelligence.
  • A specific false notification claimed that a person arrested for murder had committed suicide.
  • The BBC emphasizes the importance of trust in journalism for their audiences.
  • A similar issue occurred with notifications attributed to the New York Times, though it remains unconfirmed.
“BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world. It is essential to us that our audiences can trust any information or journalism published in our name and that includes notifications,” a BBC spokesperson said in a statement.

This incident highlights the challenges of ensuring the accuracy of AI-generated content and the responsibility of tech companies to vet information accurately.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Leaks: Bold New Features and Upgrades - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Leaks: Bold New Features and Upgrades - Sammy Fans

Publication Date: November 26, 2024

Source: Sammy Fans

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is set to be a standout flagship in 2025, featuring an advanced processor, superior display, powerful camera enhancements, and a sleek design. Scheduled for launch in January 2025, leaks suggest numerous exciting upgrades and features.

  • Design: Rounded edges, Titanium frame, and minimal bezels.
  • Display: 6.9-inch Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2x with 120Hz refresh rate and vibrant colors.
  • Camera: Quad camera setup with a 200MP primary sensor and improved ultrawide options.
  • Performance: Snapdragon 8 Elite with up to 16GB RAM and One UI 7.1 based on Android 15.
  • Battery: 5000mAh with 45W charging, maintaining previous generations' specs.
  • Release Date: January 22, 2025, confirmed for Galaxy Unpacked event in San Francisco.
The Galaxy S25 Ultra design makes it the most elegant flagship in Samsung’s history.

The Galaxy S25 Ultra promises to elevate user experience with cutting-edge features and design, setting a high standard for next-gen smartphones.

item.title: Cheapest Toyota Hybrid 7-Seater Coming! - MotorOctane
item.description:
Cheapest Toyota Hybrid 7-Seater Coming!

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: MotorOctane

Toyota is set to introduce a new 7-seater SUV in India, a more affordable alternative to the Innova Hycross, with both petrol and hybrid powertrains.

  • The new SUV will be a 7-seater version of the Toyota Hyryder.
  • Launch expected after Maruti unveils its 7-seater Grand Vitara in 2025.
  • The SUV will feature a longer wheelbase and increased height for better third-row passenger comfort.
  • Expect additional features for third-row passengers, including AC vents and charging ports.
  • Mechanically similar to the 5-seater Hyryder, with a slight price increase anticipated.
"Expect the new model to come with a slight hike of around Rs 1.5 lakh to Rs 2 lakh from its current pricing."

This upcoming Toyota 7-seater SUV aims to offer a competitive and spacious option for families, emphasizing comfort and modern features while maintaining affordability in the hybrid market.

item.title: Samsung challenges Apple Vision Pro, unveils its Moohan XR headset - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung challenges Apple Vision Pro, unveils its Moohan XR headset

Publication Date: December 14, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Samsung has unveiled its upcoming Moohan XR headset, designed for mixed reality and augmented reality experiences, during a presentation of Google's new Android XR OS. It will compete with the Apple Vision Pro and Meta Quest 3 when released next year.

  • The headset, codenamed Project Moohan, will support Google's Gemini AI assistant.
  • It will feature apps optimized for a large virtual display and run on the new Android XR platform.
  • Samsung has not disclosed specifics about the release date and pricing.
  • Advanced display technology and multi-modal input capabilities are key specifications.
  • It may include features like live translation and immersive views via Google Maps.
“The Moohan XR headset... operates on Android XR, Google's new platform that incorporates features for AR, virtual reality (VR), and artificial intelligence (AI).”

With its innovative features, Samsung's Moohan XR headset aims to position itself as a strong competitor in the growing mixed reality market, directly challenging Apple's Vision Pro.
